# Icon

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                      | Type                       | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`    | `alt`     | The alternative name of the icon | `string`                   | `''`        |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | The icon source                  | `string`                   | `undefined` |
| `name`   | `name`    | The icon key                     | `"circle-user" \| "house"` | `undefined` |
